Package com.example.austin.inthemood

InTheMood: An app that will let you record how you felt at a moment's notice in the form of a Mood.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptFollowerRequest
    AcceptFollowerRequest activity is called to give the current user the option to either remove a follower request made by another user to follow current user, allow other user to follow current user, or return back to FriendRequests and neither allow or deny request.

    Created by annaholowaychuk on 2017-03-13.

    This activity handles all of creating, editing, and deletion of a User's Mood.

    MoodCalendarActivity
    An activity that shows the which days the user documented a mood and shows them on a MaterialCalendarView.
    MoodTest  
    MyFriends
    This class displays the current user's Friends and each of their most recent moods.
    MyMoods
    My moods activity displays the list of all moods a user inputs and allows filtering the list to show only relevant moods.

    Class provides functionality for telling if the device is online or not

    RemoveFollowRequest
    RemoveFollowRequests activity is called to give the current user the option to either remove a follow request made by current user or return back to FriendRequests and not remove his request.

Package com.example.austin.inthemood Description

InTheMood: An app that will let you record how you felt at a moment's notice in the form of a Mood. Keeps track of all the Moods you've entered, with the ability to edit or delete past Moods as you wish. You can even, with permission, see the most recent Moods of other users of InTheMood! Filter Moods by emotional state, text, or by what's happened in the last week. You can even get a calendar view of when your Moods happened!
